alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Anderson, southwestern Pickens and east central Oconee Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Walhalla, or near Lake Keowee, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clemson, Seneca, Central, Pendleton, Liberty, Norris, Six Mile, Salem, Lake Keowee and Lake Hartwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
